content.text: Hello! What are your goals for the future?
I want to be an astronaut! I'm excited to start studying hard and reaching my dream.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll work hard to achieve it.
Thanks! I'm going to study math and science, and I'm going to get in shape.
I'm sure you'll do great. What's your favorite thing about space?
I love the stars! I used to spend my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching them.
Me too! I love the feeling of being outside at night, looking up at the stars.
It's amazing to think about how big and vast the universe is.
It is! And it's so interesting to think about all the different things that are out there.
I know! I can't wait to learn more about it.
I'm sure you'll learn a lot.
Thanks! I'm going to study hard.
